content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) facing DOWN (not connected to power)
- Stone furnace at (16.0,73.0) (out of fuel, no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at (17.5,70.5) (facing furnace, has fuel)

## ERROR TIPS

### Transport belt connection errors
- Cannot connect transport belts directly from furnaces - must use an inserter between furnace and belt
- This error occurred multiple times when trying to connect furnace to belts (steps 2,5,6)

### Entity placement collisions
- Failed to place burner inserter at (15.5,72.5) due to collision with existing furnace at (16.0,73.0)
- When placing entities next to others, consider:
  - Increasing spacing parameter
  - Changing direction parameter
  - Choosing different reference position
  - Checking for nearby blocking entities (this occurred in steps 4 and 7)

### Undefined variable errors
- Attempted to use undefined variable 'belts' (step 3)
- Always ensure variables are defined before use, especially after connection attempts that may fail
